title: How to Draw a Pterodactyl

steps.headline: Start by sketching a skeleton of your dinosaur.
steps.description: Draw a curved cross as shown.

steps.headline: Add in 2 triangles for the beak, a circle for the head, and an oval for the crown.
Sketch in a neck and thin body, using ovals.
steps.description: Add in feet and a very small tail.

steps.headline: Sketch in a curved triangle for the wings and don't forget to add a hand with small fingers.
Outline your drawing and add in details; erase guidelines.
Color it up and you're done!
steps.description: Be creative. You've just drawn your very own pterodactyl Congratulations! !

text: Start by sketching a skeleton of your dinosaur. Draw a curved cross as shown. Add in 2 triangles for the beak, a circle for the head, and an oval for the crown.  Sketch in a neck and thin body, using ovals. Add in feet and a very small tail. Sketch in a curved triangle for the wings and don't forget to add a hand with small fingers.  Outline your drawing and add in details; erase guidelines.  Color it up and you're done! Be creative. You've just drawn your very own pterodactyl Congratulations! !
